Uses of Class
ai.grakn.client.LoaderClient

  • Packages that use LoaderClient 
    Package Description
    ai.grakn.client
    The loader client - use this Java API to access the REST endpoint.

    • Uses of LoaderClient in ai.grakn.client

      Methods in ai.grakn.client that return LoaderClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LoaderClient LoaderClient.setBatchSize(int size)
      Set the size of the each transaction in terms of number of vars.
      LoaderClient LoaderClient.setNumberActiveTasks(int size)
      Number of active tasks running on the server at any one time.
      LoaderClient LoaderClient.setRetryPolicy(boolean retry)
      Tell the LoaderClient if it should retry sending tasks when the Engine server is not available
      LoaderClient LoaderClient.setTaskCompletionConsumer(Consumer<mjson.Json> onCompletionOfTask)
      Provide a consumer function to execute upon task completion
